attributes.additional_details:
The Railway Tavern in Nuneaton is a community pub for all ages and walks of society. It is a safe haven for the whole community and a much loved treasure for Nuneaton.  The Tav as it is more fondly known haa built a great reputation for supporting up and comming bands and encouraging all genres of music to perform.
I am a tenant with Enterprise Inns and I am experiencing financial difficulties within the business. This is due to the financial climate, high rent and business rates, being tied to Enterprise Inns for wet products and increasing energy costs. I am also aware that I have made mistakes within my business however many lessons have been learnt.
I want Enterprise Inns to put a recovry package into place to assist me in getting this amazing pub back on its feet. I have the full support of the community and am willing to put in the hard work however I can not do this without Enterprise Inns supporting me with some financial assistance.

rejection.details: Don't think this is a Gvt issue, they can't get involved with businesses and how they're run.  However, Department for Communities have an interest in local pubs with a community base.  Perhaps you can approach your local MP and get advice?  Sorry we can't do more.
